name: Nextier Initial Outreach
description: 20 Initial SMS messages for Nextier business broker deal sourcing

templates.name: Direct Valuation Offer
templates.message: {{first_name}}, Tommy here with Nextier. I've been researching {{company_name}} — curious if you've ever considered what your business could sell for? Free valuation takes 15 mins. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Buyer Interest
templates.message: Hey {{first_name}}, I have PE firms and buyers actively looking in your space. Ever wondered what {{company_name}} might be worth? Tommy with Nextier. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Industry Research
templates.message: {{first_name}}, been researching growing businesses in your industry — {{company_name}} caught my eye. I help owners understand their exit value. Worth a quick chat? STOP to opt out.

templates.name: No Pressure Intro
templates.message: Hi {{first_name}}, Tommy with Nextier. I help business owners figure out what they're sitting on — no pressure, just clarity. Ever thought about an exit? STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Market Timing
templates.message: {{first_name}}, market's strong for businesses like {{company_name}} right now. I help owners understand their options. Worth 10 mins to see your number? Tommy here. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Free Valuation
templates.message: Hey {{first_name}}, quick question — have you ever had {{company_name}} valued? I can get you a number in 15 mins, completely free. Tommy with Nextier. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Exit Planning
templates.message: {{first_name}}, most owners don't plan their exit until it's too late. I help business owners understand their options 2-3 years ahead. Worth a chat? Tommy here. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Confidential Process
templates.message: Hi {{first_name}}, Tommy with Nextier. I work with owners who want to quietly understand their options — 100% confidential. Ever thought about it? STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Success Based
templates.message: {{first_name}}, I only get paid when you do — no upfront cost. I help owners understand what buyers would actually pay for their business. Tommy with Nextier. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Quick Call
templates.message: Hey {{first_name}}, Tommy here. I'm researching {{company_name}} — have 10 mins for a quick call? I can show you what buyers are paying in your space. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Industry Multiples
templates.message: {{first_name}}, businesses in your industry are selling at 4-6x EBITDA right now. Curious where {{company_name}} would fall? Free analysis. Tommy with Nextier. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Serious Buyers
templates.message: Hi {{first_name}}, I have serious buyers looking for businesses exactly like {{company_name}}. Worth a 10 min conversation? Tommy here with Nextier. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Owner Insight
templates.message: {{first_name}}, most owners undervalue their business by 20-30%. I help you understand what you're really sitting on. Quick call? Tommy with Nextier. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Strategic Options
templates.message: Hey {{first_name}}, whether you sell now or in 5 years, knowing your number gives you leverage. I can help with that — Tommy with Nextier. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Growth Recognition
templates.message: {{first_name}}, I've been tracking {{company_name}}'s growth — impressive. Curious if you've thought about what that growth means in terms of exit value? Tommy here. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Discrete Inquiry
templates.message: Hi {{first_name}}, Tommy with Nextier. I work discreetly with owners who want to explore their options. No one knows until you decide to move. Worth a chat? STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Market Data
templates.message: {{first_name}}, I have data on what businesses like {{company_name}} are actually selling for right now. 15 min call and I can share the insights. Tommy with Nextier. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: No Obligation
templates.message: Hey {{first_name}}, no strings attached — I can run a quick valuation on {{company_name}} so you know your real number. Interested? Tommy here. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Retirement Planning
templates.message: {{first_name}}, thinking about retirement or your next chapter? Your business might be worth more than you think. Quick chat? Tommy with Nextier. STOP to opt out.

templates.name: Opportunity Intro
templates.message: Hi {{first_name}}, I came across {{company_name}} while researching acquisition opportunities in your space. Have a few minutes to chat? Tommy with Nextier. STOP to opt out.
